Posted By: Falgorn (9/29/2010 11:52:15 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Seeing this card makes me want to invent mad combos with it, which, to me, makes for a very fun card.
  
   
There are many great ideas floating around in this discussion and while I haven't read all of them I would really like to combo this little guy with Venser.
  
   
You could make it unblockable without Venser losing any counters, but that would only be decent if there are other cards that require counters present, otherwise you're only really swinging for 1 which isn't all that incredible. But thinking of all the counter madness in SoM I'm sure something could be made of this combo...
  
   
Preferably 2+ Thrummingbirds. Then this simple combo will soon power Venser's wonderful ultimate.
  
   
Anyway, great card that offers a lot of fun to build around.
posts.html:

Posted By: NecroticNobody (10/17/2010 7:05:19 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Creature - Bird Horror  
Yes, that *is* one terrifying bird.  
  
I love this in my modular deck. Turn 1, [Arcbound Worker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arcbound Worker); Turn 2, Thrummingbird; Turn 3, [Ashnod's Transmogrant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ashnod's Transmogrant) and swing. I now have a 3/3 flyer and a 2/2 on 3rd turn that I can use [Throne of Geth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Throne of Geth) on turn 4 to make into one 6/6 flyer that only gets bigger every time it attacks. Awesome.
posts.html:
Creature - Bird Horror
Yes, that is one terrifying bird.

I love this in my modular deck. Turn 1, Arcbound Worker; Turn 2, Thrummingbird; Turn 3, Ashnod's Transmogrant and swing. I now have a 3/3 flyer and a 2/2 on 3rd turn that I can use Throne of Geth on turn 4 to make into one 6/6 flyer that only gets bigger every time it attacks. Awesome.
